text: Bert Patenaude (4 November 1909 – 4 November 1974) is a former American soccer player. He played for United States national team in the first-ever FIFA World Cup in 1930. ==Honors== Fall River F.C. *American Soccer League: 1928–29, 1929, 1930 *National Challenge Cup: 1930, 1931 St. Louis Central Breweries *National Challenge Cup: 1935 United States *FIFA World Cup third place: 1930 Individual *FIFA World Cup Bronze Boot: 1930 *FIFA World Cup All-Star Team: 1930 *U.S. Soccer Hall of Fame: 1971 Category:1909 births Category:1974 deaths Category:American soccer players Category:Sportspeople from Massachusetts Category:1930 FIFA World Cup players
title: Bert Patenaude
